column4: can someone answer why i get   http://wine.budgetdedicated.com/apt/dists/dapper/main/binary-amd64/Packages.gz: 404 Not Found   when trying to Reload synaptic ?? i have done exactly as instructed on the winehq site
there probably aren't any packages for amd64
should be able to, you'll just need the 32bit libraries and the usual wine
that's all the help I can give.
